title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: In the 'copy package' feature of org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3, there is an unexpected behavior. Selecting xxx as the destination package does not produce the desired results.
OB: When selecting a package and choosing the 'copy' option from the context menu, the package is not being copied to the desired destination (xxx).
EB: The package should be copied to the selected destination (xxx) when using the 'copy' option.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project (xxx). 
2. Open the Package viewer. 
3. Select a package in the project (e.g., package A). 
4. From the context menu, choose 'copy'. 
5. Select xxx as the destination in the 'copy package' dialog. 
6. Verify that the package is not copied to the expected destination.
